participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: nurturing and creative, often striving to find balance in life.
participant_1.background: i live is a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. i like to watch nhl hockey. i enjoy coloring books.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and patient, always looking for ways to support his family.
participant_2.background: i am a stay at home dad. i've a son who is in junior high school. i spent a decade working in the human services field. horror movies are my favorites.

content.text: I am messed up with my son
